full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR RANG GZHAN GYI DON DU MCHOG DMAN GYI MGRON GTOR MA DANG, ,GSER SKYEMS DANG, ,BSANGS GSOG LA GTONG SKABS 'DOD DON DMIGS GSAL CAN SBYAR BAR 'DOD BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,('DI YANG NYER MKHO'I YAN LAG TU 'DOD GSOL KHA BSGYUR 'DI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SHAR MAR SPEL BA'O,,DGE LEGS RGYAL ZHING BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
